oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Tammy Gentuso Oral History Interview, 2011 February 9
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Tammy Gentuso, conducted on February 9, 2011 by Susannah Gibbons as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Tammy describes the rescue of her elderly parents in Pennington Bend during the May 2010 flood.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gentuso, Tammy, 1963- --Interviews
